error.serverNotSupported: Jira Server is not supported yet
error.microsoftLogin: Could not verify Microsoft login. Please refresh and try again.
error.atlassianLogin: Atlassian login failed. Please try again.
error.yasoonLogin: Encountered an error while processing your login. The yasoon team has been notified.
error.createIssue: Couldn't create issue, please check fields!
error.fileUpload: Some of your files appear to be invalid.

error.portalSettingsSaveError: Could not save portal settings. Please try again later.
error.downloadJsmAppError: Could not download the app. Please try again later.

chooseDesk.heading: Choose a service desk
chooseDesk.subHeading: Welcome! You can raise a support request after selecting a service desk.

chooseGroup.heading: Contact us about
chooseGroup.subHeading: Select a field which you would like to contact us about.

chooseType.subHeading: You can raise a support request from the options provided.

createTicket.typeChooserLabel: What can we help you with?

fields.dropzoneHelptext: Drop files or click to select
fields.userFieldNoResults: We couldn't find a matching user.

myRequests.heading: My requests
myRequests.editorPlaceholder: What do you want to say?

jira.privateChannelNotSupported: Private channels are not supported currently
jira.appNotInstalledInTeam: The app is not installed in this team yet.
jira.additionalContentInTeams: This message has additional content you can view in Teams
jira.installBeforeChannelPost: To post Jira issues to a Microsoft Teams channel, you'll need to install the app into the team first.
jira.editorChannelTargetPlaceholder: Type a message... You can also @-mention any channel member!
jira.linkedGroupChat: A group chat linked to this issue
jira.postToSelectedChannel: Post a new message to the selected channel
jira.addOnePersonToStartChat: You need to add at least one person to start a chat
jira.needMessage: You need to add a message
jira.selectChannelToStartConversation: Select a channel to start a conversation
jira.privateMessageNoAdaptiveCards: Private channels don't support interactive cards
jira.linkToTeamsInfo: A simple link to this issue will be posted to Teams.
jira.noChatsOrConversations: There are no Teams chats or conversations linked to this issue yet. Start one now!
jira.welcomeToTeamsForJira: Welcome to Microsoft Teams for Jira
jira.firstUseLoginInfo: Looks like you are using the app for the very first time. Please login with your Microsoft 365 account to get started!
jira.selectUserToStartChat: Select at least one participant to start a chat..
jira.typeEmailOrNameToSearch: Type an email address or name to search...
jira.connectivityHelpText: Please enter the URL under which your Jira system is reachable from the internet. If you change the existing public URL of your system, all users will be logged out of the current instance.
jira.staticIPHelpText: If you need to allow IPs in your firewall, please check out our {link1}
jira.jiraUrlHelpText: This is the publicly reachable URL of your Jira instance
jira.appearanceHelpText: Please choose where the Microsoft Teams conversations and chat view should be visible. By default, it is located in the content area of the issue. For a less prominent positioning, you can switch this to use the activity tab area besides the comments tab.
jira.quickCreateTooltip: Enables an always visible compose bar in every issue, like a comment box.
jira.staticIPHelpText3: To use the app, your Jira system will need to be reachable by our servers. If you system is behind a firewall, you can allow access for the following IPs - all requests will come from these IPs.
jira.setupSubHeader: Setting up the Microsoft Teams app
jira.setupHelpText1: To use the app, you'll need to install the 'Smart Connect for Jira' app in Microsoft Teams as well.
jira.setupHelpText2: Just add it to the desired team
jira.setupHelpText3: Please note that you'll have to be the team owner to install the app.
jira.setupHelpText4: Please make sure to use 'Add to a team', as shown in the screenshot below!
jira.licenseValid: Your license is active and valid!
jira.portalsShownInTeams: Jira Service Management portals shown in Teams
jira.noPortalsAvailable: No Jira Service Management portals are available. Please create a new JSM project first!
jira.longTitlesCutoff: Long titles will be cut off in Teams.
jira.longTitlesCutoffHelpText: Titles longer than 10 characters will be truncated in the Teams sidebar. Please consider using a shorter title.
jira.customAppCompatibilityModeHelpText: Activate this if you have custom apps in your customer service portal.
jira.portalAppDownloadInstructions: Click the button below to download the app .zip-file. Please refer to the instructions on how to install / distribute the app.
jira.jsmFirstVisit: Seems like this is your first visit. Please save your configuration, download the app and install it in Microsoft Teams.
jira.saveSettings: Please save your configuration, generate a new app and install it in Microsoft Teams.
jira.criticalSettingChanged: You changed a setting that requires an update of the Teams app.
jira.jsmAppHeader: Jira Service Management customer portal app
jira.jsmAppIntro: You can configure a custom Microsoft Teams app that integrates the Jira Service Management portal into Microsoft Teams. After configuring the app, you can download the app and install it for your customers.
jira.onlyMembersChat: Only members of the chat can view it in Jira
jira.contextChatAccess: {{group}} with issue access can view chat messages
jira.linkedChat: A chat linked to this issue

teams.noMatchingIssue: We couldn't find a matching issue.
teams.noMatchingIssueType: We couldn't find a matching issue type.
teams.noMatchingProject: We couldn't find a matching project.
teams.addBotToUseAction: To use this action, please add the app to this team first.
teams.jiraAppHelpText: To use this app, please install or update the Jira app from the Atlassian Marketplace first.
teams.chatLinkingHelpText: This group chat will be fully linked to the selected issue, linking a single message is currently only supported in channels.
teams.connectToJiraCloudHelpText: To connect to Jira Cloud, we are going to link your Teams and Jira account. We'll first prompt you to login with Microsoft and immediately afterwards continue to Jira!
teams.connectToJiraHelpText: Please choose your Jira, or let us detect it for you!
teams.provideJiraInstanceUrl: Please provide the Url of your Jira instance. We check if a connection is possible
teams.unsupportedActionHelpText: Unfortunately this action is not supported in chats yet. Please get in touch in case you need this function.

support.contactUsHelpText: In case you need technical help or just want to learn about our product, we are happy to help!
support.checkDocumentationHelpText: It's always a good idea to check out our documentation first, we try to answer common questions there. Use the quick links below to get started!
support.useCasesHelpText: We have compiled a list of use cases to give you a head start.

commentVisibility.tooltipExplanation: Choose visibility of the issue comment about chat or conversation creation.
